name: Bolt News
author: RianGraphics

sections.description:
Simple short News sidebar for fast and clean comunication.

Easy to setup your short news
Bolt News is a plugin t help you integrate a fast and clean news and short comunication sistem.

Easy to setup
Bolt News has a nice and clean settings page, to help you create your news and comunication messages.

Check out official page for Bolt News RianGraphics

A few notes about the sections above:

  • “Contributors” riangraphics
  • “Tags” news, simple, news, sidebar news, popup news, sidebar, toast
  • “Requires at least” 3.5
  • “Tested up to” 4.7
  • “trunk”

Arbitrary section

Nothing to say.
sections.installation:
Bolt News can be installed like any other wordpress plugin.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/bolt-news directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Bolt News screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Bolt News can be installed like any other wordpress plugin.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/bolt-news directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Bolt News screen to configure the plugin

Is this a complicated plugin to use?

Absolutely not, Bolt News is an easy to use plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • first release of Bolt News WordPress Plugin.
